body: ${1:带快捷选项}

<el-select v-model="${1:value}" placeholder="${2:请选择}">
  <el-option
    v-for="${3:item in options}"
    v-bind:key="${4:item.value}"
    :label="${5:item.label}"
    :value="${6:item.value}">
  </el-option>
</el-select>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      ${7:options}: ${8:[{}
        ${9:value}: '${10:选项1}',
        ${11:label}: '${12:黄金糕}'
      }, {
        ${13:value}: '${14:选项2}',
        ${15:label}: '${16:双皮奶}',
        ${17:price}: ${18:false}
      }, {
        ${19:value}: '${20:选项3}',
        ${21:label}: '${22:蚵仔煎}',
        ${23:prices}: ${24:[]}
      }, {
        ${25:value}: '${26:选项4}',
        ${27:label}: '${28:龙须面}',
        ${29:price}: ${30:40}
      }, {
        ${31:value}: '${32:选项5}',
        ${33:label}: '${34:北京烤鸭}',
        ${35:price}: ${36:50}
      }],
      ${37:value}: '${38:}'
    }
  }
}
</script>
